font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . However, sexual arousal is both a physiological and psychological response.<br />\n<br />\nFemale physical sexual arousal begins with the excitement phase. An increase in genital blood flow leads to vascular engorgement. This increase in blood flow and pressure causes an increase in fluid (transudate) production from the vaginal walls<br />\n<br />\nArousal fluid is distinct from cervical fluid, and occurs as a result of the excitement phase in the sexual response cycle. Checking your cervical fluid after sexual activity may be misleading, as it can be confused with semen or arousal fluid.<br />\n<br />\nPaired mucous glands at the entrance to the vagina -- called Bartholin or greater vestibular glands -- secrete a small amount of mucus when a woman is sexually aroused. This mucus lubricates the vaginal opening to make sexual intercourse more comfortable. In the absence of sexual arousal, the Bartholin glands typically do not contribute to the normal vaginal lubrication.<br />\n<br />\nVaginal lubrication largely comes through the vaginal walls, with the fluids having originally been a part of the blood that flows to the genitals and pelvic area during a sexual arousal.<br />\n<br />\nVaginal dryness is caused by lowered levels of estrogen, the hormone responsible for making fluids flow through the vaginal canal.<br />\n<br />\nMORE THAN 90 % OF WHITE WOMEN HAVE PROBLEMS WITH LUBRICATION ON THE FIRST NIGHT WITH HER HUSBAND--AS SHE IS NOT A STRANGER TO SEX. THIS IS WELL UNDERSTOOD BY THE HUSBAND , WHO ALSO KNOWS HOW MUCH HIS FIRST LOVE CREAMED ON THE PROM NIGHT. THE MARRIAGE IS DOOMED ON THE FIRST NIGHT ITSELF .<br />\n<br />\nSexual intercourse without proper lubrication causes pain and cuts, which can lead to various infections and diseases.<br />\n<br />\nThis is when the white man demands ORAL sex from his wife. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/10/second-defeat-for-deep-state-capt-ajit.html?showComment=1539077526536#c959584111397182603\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">October 9, 2018 at 3:02 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_143MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jB7wpklVRNE<br /><br />DONALD TRUMP<br /><br />LISTEN UP AND LISTEN GOOD<br /><br />JEW NOAM CHOMSKY IS THIS PLANETs NO 1 CONMAN-- A DEEP STATE DOUBLE AGENT..<br /><br />WHATEVER HE WROTE ABOUT LINGUISTICS IS LIFTED FROM PANINIs WORK ( 5500 BC )..WITH HALF BAKED UNDERSTANDING --APPLYING IT TO A STUPID LANGUAGE NAMED ENGLISH WITH SPELLINGS AND SYNTAX.<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/10/avram-noam-chomsky-karl-marx-of-new.html<br /><br />In 1950s, Noam Chomsky, then a professor at MIT, combined linguistics and mathematics, and formalized CFGs, lifting from Panini's work with half baked understanding.<br /><br />He called it Phrase Structure Grammar. CFGs were then introduced as block structures into programming languages, with Algol, by John Backus. Backus described the syntax of Algol using Chomsky's context-free grammar. This was called the Backus Normal Form.<br /><br />A few years later, Peter Naur improved on the BNF by reducing the size of the massive character set used by Backus, renaming BNF to Backus-Naur Form. Backus-Naur Form is still in heavy use today. Panini had come up with better constructs independent of, and seven milliniums earlier than, Backus or Naur).<br /><br />In 1965, Noam Chomsky wrote in the preface of his book Aspects of the Theory of Syntax that P\u0101\u1e47ini\u2019s grammar (A\u1e63\u1e6dadhyayi) is a \u201cgenerative grammar, in essentially the contemporary sense of this term\u201d. If someone developing a new theory bumps into a work that delineates the same theory, he should study carefully this work before giving a next step.<br /><br />It seems that Chomsky , a fellow of inferior intellect , never understood Panini .. For Pa\u1e47ini, a structure could never be seen as deep and surface, but on pairs in one unique level. What makes the structure (syntax) much more \u201ccomputable\u201d<br /><br />Several white scholars had remarked that if Chomsky had studied the A\u1e63\u1e6dadhyayi in 1965, with help from Indian Sanskrit experts , maybe he could advance his theory and avoid major mistakes his theory has.<br /><br />P\u0101\u1e47ini\u2019s treatment of syntax and semantics presents analogies to various aspects of several modern linguistic theories, What Chomsky calls Principles and Parameters model is exactly what Pa\u1e47ini calls Samanya (general) and Vise\u1e63a (particular) and all his grammar is delineated with them.<br /><br />Chomsky, in an award acceptance speech delivered in India in 2001, admitted \"The first generative grammar in the modern sense was Panini's grammar\".<br /><br />Panini does not need CUNT Chomsky to declare his brilliance .<br /><br />capt ajit vadakayil<br />..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</ol>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; There are duties attached to it\u2026 Any society with laws can only allow privacy subject to conditions\u2026<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">DHARMA CANNOT PREVAIL WHEN THERE IS ABSOLUTE PRIVACY...</span><br />\n<br />\nPrivacy for what?.. To hide misdeeds?...<br />\n<br />\nPeople who are most vocal for privacy on TV are mostly immoral persons from inside , those who have rotten secrets to hide\u2026<br />\n<br />\nCriminals with FAKE Pan cards and benami properties are leaving no stone unturned to hide behind privacy rights, so that that can continue to loot the country. .<br />\n<br />\nIn India you have more many times more tax evaders than tax payers.. .So Aadhar card is a MUST. ..<br />\n<br />\nSome people oppose this just because they have an axe to grind with PM Modi.<br />\n<br />\nPRIVACY CANT BE ABSOLUTE...IN GARB OF PRIVACY AND VEILED FACES , LOT OF DESH DROHI AND UNLAWFUL ACTIVITIES CAN TAKE PLACE\u2026.<br />\n<br />\nIs checking of baggage of a passengers violation of human rights and privacy rights?.. How many of you would like to board a plane where its bags are not checked ? .. Why have an alcometer test for the pilot ?.. Can a Muslim woman refuse to show her face at any airport under her right to privacy ?..<br />\n<br />\nA level headed balance needs to be maintained between the right to privacy and the right of the state to impose reasonable restrictions on it for legitimate aims such as national security, prevention and investigation of crimes and distribution of welfare resources\u2026<br />\n<br />\nLet this balance be provided by the ELECTED LAW MAKERS. .. We don\u2019t trust the judiciary who have left their own cases pending for three decades. .. They have NOT cared for the undertrails . .. Just shows their sense of commitment to the WATAN and accountability\u2026<br />\n<br />\nThe judges call for privacy. .. Yet they encourage \u201cbravehearts\u201d to show their YUCK private parts at midnight on public roads in cahoots with NCW and Benami media\u2026\u2026..<br />\n<br />\nCONTINUED TO 2--</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2018/04/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_17.html?showComment=1524058819777#c527892885858383236\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 18, 2018 at 7:10 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_126MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 1--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nPast corrupt Congress politicians , terrorists , scammers and criminals don''t want to be caught.. So in the name of privacy they oppose Aadhar.. In the name of privacy all MAJOR crimes are committed in India and even the court lets them off for want of evidence..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">JUDGES HAVE NO RIGHT UNDER THE CONSTITUTION TO CREATE LAWS AND AS SUCH EVERY LAW MADE BY JUDICIARY SINCE INDEPENDENCE IS AUTOMATICALLY NULL AND VOID \u2013 UNLESS ENDORSED BY THE ELECTED LEGISLATURE . .. ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn the constitutions of almost ALL developed democracies, the word \u201ccitizen\u201d appears late in the text, never in the first paragraph. .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe Indians are like cats who fell in HOT water (slavery ) and we are circumspect with COLD water today.. The major exception to this is the Indian Constitution... Here, unlike all others, the term \u201ccitizen\u201d makes its appearance right there in the first sentence, that is, in the Preamble itself\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe lawmakers MUST make constitutional amendments to Part III of the constitution- to PRESERVE THE INTEGRITY OF THE WATAN AND TO PRESERVE DHARMA\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nEveryone has the right to life, liberty \u2013and security ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTO PROVIDE THIS SECURITY ( TO PEOPLE AND THE WATAN ) THE ELECTED EXECUTIVE WILL DO ITS DUTIES AS DEEMED FIT- THEY DONT NEED ADVISE FROM COLLEGIUM JUDGES..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWE THE PEOPLE WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION , DON\u2019T CARE FOR PAST JUDGEMENT MADE BY COLLEGIUM MELORDS. .. .. ALL THESE MINDLESS JUDGEMENTS DEVOID OF NATURAL JUSTICE AND CONTEXT ARE FIT ONLY TO BE BURNT. ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nANY JUDGEMENT WHICH HURTS THE WATAN AND GOOD CITIZENS IS NULL AND VOID. .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHey collegium Melords\u2014have you applied Article 21 to UNDERTRIALS rotting in jail without trial for decades?... The right to life and liberty guaranteed by Article 21 of the constitution, which is inseparable from the right to live with dignity\u2026 Article 21 prohibits the deprivation of the above rights EXCEPT ACCORDING TO A PROCEDURE ESTABLISHED BY LAW. ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nHey collegium Melords\u2014have you applied Article 21 to UNTERTRIALS rotting in jail without trial for decades?...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">WITHOUT AADHAR AND DIGITALISATION ( TO FACTOR IN FAMILY BASED COTTAGE INDUSTRIES IN GDP ) INDIA CANNOT BECOME THE PLANET NO 1 SUPERPOWER IN 15 YEARS</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n\u201cWE THE PEOPLE\u201d WHO ARE ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION WARN THE JUDICIARY\u2014 DO NOT PUT ROAD BLOCKS IN FRONT OF PM MODI WHO IS TRYING TO TAKE INDIA FORWARD . ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe absolute right to privacy is non-existent in today\u2019s modern world... It does NOT exist anywhere on this planet- I can say this after travelling this planet for 4 decades \u2026I am NOT a frog in the well like our Collegium Melords..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">Privacy was not explicitly mentioned in the Constitution ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe people of India have no absolute right to claim it. .. If this has to be explicit, it must be done by the ELECTED LAW MAKERS and not the UNCONSTITUTIONAL COLLEGIUM LAW INTERPRETERS.. .</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe inclusion or exclusion of fundamental rights is only the proviso of Parliament\u2026 Here, the judiciary is taking over the functions of Parliament. Hey, let them do it - but WE THE PEOPLE declare it NULL AND VOID..\u2026.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIn this internet age we all can read and interpret the constitution\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBY ASKING THAT TRUTH BE HIDDEN, ARE THESE MELORDS PROTECTING BHARATMATA ?..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE INDIAN CONSTITUTION DOES NOT PROTECT ANY DESH DROHI \u2013ESPECIALLY THOSE WHO POINT A FOREIGN GUN AT BHARATMATA..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nWe will not allow , the right to privacy to hide the naked truth. .. Good people who have nothing to hide do not need a veil of privacy..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">JUDGES CAN ONLY JUDGE FOR A SPECIFIC CASE\u2026 WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW JUDGES TO CREATE PATHETIC RULINGS WHICH WILL BE USED AS A LIFE LONG GOSPEL- WITHOUT UNDERSTANDING THE CONTEXT..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nJUDGES DID NOT FIND ANYTHING WRONG WHEN 5.1 LAKHS KASHMIRI PANDITS WERE ETHNICALLY CLEANSED AND SUBJECTED TO GENOCIDE\u2026 THOUSANDS OF HINDU TEMPLES WERE RAZED DOWN IN KASHMIR. ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nBUT HEY, THESE MELORDS JUMPED LIKE DEMENTED ORANGUTANS WHEN A BABRI MAJID ( MECCA OF HINDUS ) WAS RAZED DOWN..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">HULLO PM MODI, THE CONSTITUTION IS A DYNAMIC DOCUMENT. .. IT IS NOT ETCHED ON ROCK ..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED TO 3--</div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span class=\"comment-actions secondary-text\" id=\"bc_0_126MN\" kind=\"m\"><span class=\"item-control blog-admin pid-1783552029\" style=\"display: inline;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_126BR\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 36px; margin-top: 1em;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replybox-single\" id=\"bc_0_126B_box\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin-left: 48px; margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_127B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"border-bottom: 0px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; font-size: 16px; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c228281002672827782\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_127M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. text-decoration-line: none;\">April 18, 2018 at 7:11 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_127MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCONTINUED FROM 2--</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: purple; font-size: medium;\">The Constitution''s provisions have consciously been worded in generalities, though not in vague terms, instead of making them rigid and static with a fixed meaning or content as in an ordinary statute, so that they may be interpreted by coming generations of citizens with the ONWARD MARCH OF TIME, to apply to NEW AND EVER CHANGING AND DEMANDING SITUATIONS, making the Constitution a living and an organic document\u2026</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nRigidity tends to check progressive legislation or gradual innovation\u2026 ONLY A FLEXIBLE DYNAMIC CONSTITUTION CAN SURVIVE THE TEST OF TIME.</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nIN 1947 WHO WOULD EVEN IMAGINE OF DIGITIZATION OF INDIAN ECONOMY AND OF SOMETHING CALLED GST \u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nRIGHT TO LIFE as guaranteed under Article 21, has by interpretation been expanded to progressively mean a whole lot of human rights..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: medium;\">A constitution is not a parchment of paper, it is a way of life and has to be lived up to\u2026 Eternal vigilance is the price of liberty and in the final analysis, its only keepers are WE THE PEOPLE\u2026.</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT ACTS AGAINST THE WATAN.. THE CONSTITUTION BECOMES NULL AND VOID IF IT GOES AGAINST THE PRINCIPLE OF DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE ).... ..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe framers of our Constitution and WE THE PEOPLE did not intend the judiciary to be \u201csuperior\u201d to elected Parliament and the elected executive, but intended it to be the sentinel on the qui vive should the other two wings overstep the boundaries of their jurisdiction or omit to discharge their duty as public trustees\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY DO NOT HAVE THE CEREBRAL WHEREWITHAL TO APPLY BODMAS AND TO PRIORITISE SECTIONS OF THE CONSTITUTION....</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCollegium Judiciary CANNOT exercise adjudicatory power, without any CHECKS AND BALANCES \u2026 This would be destructive of the basic feature of democracy, and if not forthwith remedied, would dilute the very essence of a democratic form of governance\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe ILLEGAL COLLEGIUM JUDICIARY has never ever been accountable in the manner that the elected executive is accountable.. These Melords keep pointing fingers without any sense of accountability.. It is a constitutional imperative that an authority must be accountable if it wields power..</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nThe Collegium judiciary has developed the mindset that it is above the law...</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<span style=\"color: magenta; font-size: medium;\"><b>WITH JEW ROTHSCHILD GETTING SO MUCH OF PRIVACY ---THAT IT TOOK A BLOGGER NAMED CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL TO REVEAL THAT ROTHSCHILD RULED INDIA, NOT THE KING, QUEEN OR THE BRITISH PARLIAMENT....</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nTHE CONSTITUTION IS NOT SUPREME ... ABOVE THE CONSTITUTION LIES .. 1) WE THE PEOPLE..\u2026 2) WATAN ( BHARATMATA )..\u2026 3) DHARMA ( NATURAL JUSTICE )\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nCOLLEGIUM ( ROGUE BODY NOT ALLOWED BY THE CONSTITUTION ) SUPREME COURT WHICH IS UNACCOUNTABLE TO THE PEOPLE CAN ONLY REACH UPTO THE CONSTITUTION-- ..THESE JUDGES CANNOT REACH HIGHER THAN THIS LEVEL, COME WHAT MAY\u2026</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\nELECTED EXECUTIVE HAS THE POWERS / RESPONSIBILITY TO LISTEN TO THE VOICE OF THE PEOPLE ( JUDGES CANNOT ) IN A DEMOCRACY..&nbsp;&nbsp;</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n<span style=\"color: red;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/10/avram-noam-chomsky-karl-marx-of-new.html<br /><br />http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/08/right-to-privacy-in-india-is-not.html</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\ncapt ajit vadakayil</div>\n<div style=\"font-size: 16px;\">\n..</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_128b+seedbvlD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YEUjkXob4xU/UlwRtT-Ns-I/AAAAAAAAmVE/BqcTE3p821M/s1600/download.jpgngfjyf.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YEUjkXob4xU/UlwRtT-Ns-I/AAAAAAAAmVE/BqcTE3p821M/s320/download.jpgngfjyf.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What is RAP music?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It has its roots&nbsp; in the black slave colonies . The slaves narrated their miserable conditions and frustrations set to drum beats , just\nfor catharsis and stress busting.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cenHUMc_dVA/UlusBxxrbWI/AAAAAAAAmUk/r9RW389N_gY/s1600/images.jpgKHB.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"250\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cenHUMc_dVA/UlusBxxrbWI/AAAAAAAAmUk/r9RW389N_gY/s400/images.jpgKHB.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This rap music later\nmigrated to the city bronx, where black teen gangsters included curse words,\nlyrics degrading women and promoting violence n drugs.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapping is now spoken\nlyrics.&nbsp; It could be prose, poetry, or\nsinging set to music .&nbsp; The audience\nenjoys the punch lyrics more than the music .&nbsp;\nThe lyrics are rapid, slangy, and often tongue in cheek.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapping started as the\nnext wave of toasting in the emerging hip-hop scene during the 1970s. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapping is not just a\nboys\u2019 club. &nbsp;Women started rapping in the 1980s in USA.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rapping on\ncontroversial topics is&nbsp; today considered\na very mainstream music genre theme. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nYKd8Sa8MFc/UlwReyjB3AI/AAAAAAAAmU8/uHDUcu9bEys/s1600/images.jpghtfc.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-nYKd8Sa8MFc/UlwReyjB3AI/AAAAAAAAmU8/uHDUcu9bEys/s400/images.jpghtfc.jpg\" width=\"396\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It wasn\u2019t until\n1979, when the Sugarhill Gang released their breakaway hit, \u2018Rapper\u2019s Delight,\nthat record producers took notice of this emerging musical genre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The late 1980s saw the\nadvent of \u201cgangsta rap,\u201d with lyrics that were often misogynistic ,that\nglamorized violence, drug dealing and whoring around.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_kgt4uPIXXo/UlusKlQ_HYI/AAAAAAAAmUs/sue0zjW0PeQ/s1600/mullyman1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"474\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_kgt4uPIXXo/UlusKlQ_HYI/AAAAAAAAmUs/sue0zjW0PeQ/s640/mullyman1.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mainstream rap music is\nnow full of vulgar&nbsp; licentious lyrics,\nand lewd music videos.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unfortunately,\nmusic conglomerates believe, perhaps rightfully so, that sex and violence sells\nin America .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
